alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 5:39AM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. Blowing snow will reduce visibility and cause snow drifts to form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It is possible that winds could gust even higher late Saturday night and Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
